#load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

#load my dataset (qld_leases)
#Queensland aquaculture in land leases data obtained from DAF
```{r}
qld_leases<-st_read(here("raw_data/QLD_aqua/Current_land_based_marine_distances.shp"))
```
#reproject data
```{r}
qld_leases_reproj<-st_transform(qld_leases, 3577)
```
#load my dataset 
```{r}
qld_leases_erosion<-st_read(here("output_data/qld_leases_erosion.shp"))
```

```{r}
qld_leases_erosion_area<-st_area(qld_leases_erosion)
```

#in my dataset (qld_leases-reproj) make all the areas be in hectares
```{r}
qld_leases_reproj_with_area<-mutate(st_area(qld_leases_reproj))
```
